metadata.title: Grider - Free Photo Grid Maker | Create Beautiful Layouts
metadata.description: Create stunning photo grid layouts for free. Choose from multiple layouts, customize gaps, corners, and backgrounds. Download as PNG instantly. No signup required.

editor.title: Edit Your Grid
editor.subtitle: Click to add photos, drag to rearrange
editor.fillAllSlots: Fill all slots to enable download

section1.title: Information We Collect
section1.content: Grider is a client-side photo editing tool. All photo processing happens locally in your browser. We do not upload, store, or have access to any photos you edit using our service.

section2.title: Cookies and Advertising
section2.content: We use Google AdSense to display advertisements. Google may use cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website or other websites. You can opt out of personalized advertising by visiting Google's Ads Settings.

section3.title: Analytics
section3.content: We may use analytics services to understand how visitors use our website. This helps us improve our service. Analytics data is collected anonymously.

section4.title: Third-Party Services
section4.content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites or services. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these external sites.

section5.title: Data Security
section5.content: Since all photo processing occurs locally in your browser, your images never leave your device. We implement appropriate security measures to protect any data we do collect.

section6.title: Contact Us
section6.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through our website.
